title: Fennel, red onion and garlic tart

ingredients.item: 1 large red onion, peeled and sliced

instructions.step: Preheat the oven to 200°C, gas mark 6. Unroll the pastry and cut in half lengthways. Lay both pieces on to a lined baking sheet.

Divide the Roulé cheese out between the two strips of pastry and spread evenly, leaving a 2cm border along each side. 3 In a large bowl, toss together the fennel, onion, garlic and thyme, along with 1 tbsp of the oil. Add the lemon zest and half the lemon juice, and season generously.
Scatter the vegetables on to the pastry, then bake in the preheated oven for 30 minutes until the pastry is puffed and golden.
Crumble over the feta cheese and bake for a further 10 minutes.
Meanwhile, toss the spinach leaves with the remaining olive oil and lemon juice. Serve the tart with the dressed spinach leaves.
